metadata.title: CVE-2024-53098 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/xe/ufence: Prefetch ufence addr to catch bogus addressaccess_ok() only checks for addr overflow so also try to read the addrto catch invalid addr sent from userspace.(cherry picked from commit 9408c4508483ffc60811e910a93d6425b8e63928)

criterions.comment: linux package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
